The weekend was great.  It was so much fun. 
AHHHH, I wanna go back.
How many pictures in total? ...902

NOTRE DAME PROM 2006 was definitely sexed. 
Everyone was gorgeoussssss. Loved the white prom.
Boat was alright but the view was breath-taking. 
I still can't believe how gorgeous everyone looked. 
Food was alright and boy was i seasick. 
Dancing was nuts! Just like how we do in clubs. MAD PACKED! 
Pictures turned out so well. I have 200 pics from prom. 
Boy, did i have a blast! I can't believe it's over. *sigh*
After party was nutssssss. I rode the bus 3 times! WHAT! 
And never did i cry so much in one night. *shrugs* 
Nonetheless, i had fun. The after party party was such a chill session.
You guys are great. I love it.

MORE PICTURES.

PROM IS IN FOUR DAYS

and....

i don't have my accesories, my flower, my purse or my shoes.

i don't have money. ha. damn you grade 12 year.

I still care.

Ah, I'm gonna fatten myself up some more with some ice cream. Ok, good bye.

Instructions: Write 15 statements intended towards 15 1 person, and never tell them it was about them. Something you would never say to their face or something you wish you said, but didn't...

1) I want you. 
2) I miss you. 
3) I wish I didn't act this way.
4) I'm trying to change.
5) I care. I care. I care. 
6) I'm sorry I hurt you.
7) I want it to be like old times.
8) I think you overreact at times.
9) I'm sorry I put you through the same crap.
10) Believe me, I'm trying to change.
11) I'm sorry if I did anything to hurt you.
12) I'm so stressed.
13) I'm sorry that it had to be this way.
14) I want it to be like how it was with us five months ago.
15) Oh how I want that so badly.

The Keys to Your Heart
You are attracted to obedience and warmth. In love, you feel the most alive when things are straight-forward, and you're told that you're loved. You'd like to your lover to think you are loyal and faithful... that you'll never change. You would be forced to break up with someone who was insecure and in constant need of reassurance. Your ideal relationship is comforting. You crave a relationship where you always feel warmth and love. Your risk of cheating is high. You can't resist desire and lust. You think of marriage as something precious. You'll treasure marriage and treat it as sacred. In this moment, you think of love as something you thirst for. You'll do anything for love, but you won't fall for it easily.
What Are The Keys To Your Heart?

...don't mind the fat.




but otherwise i think its pretty cool.

Dear Significant other, 

       There is so many things that I wanted to tell you but, for some reason, I could not bring myself to do it. Yes, that means the cat got my tongue and I was left silent on the other end. I do not even know where to begin. Ok, I am going to start off admitting that YES, it is my fault we are left in this state of mind because I did not think before I spoke. But hey, I am only human. I make mistakes too, and at times a lot of it. That's my bad on my part and I know for a solid fact that I can't do anything about that. I cannot turn back time and rewind everything to make it all gravy. With that fact, I cannot say anything to you but sorry (whether you believe me or not, I do not know). I know I called you names and said numerous hurtful things; things that even if i wanted to.. cannot take back. It's been said. With that thing that i blurted out, I do not expect you to believe me when I say that it isn't true (even though it isn't). Here I am telling you that everything that we went through, and all those times that we were together is genuinely true and for a goddamn fact is not a lie. IT'S NOT A LIE. I do not know how else to tell you. I don't know. I've said it a bajillion million times before and here I am saying it again. I haven't given up trying to convince you otherwise. Fact is, it is my fault, it is. I know it. With that, I know you think I'm crazy and psycho but so be it. I don't really care. So, I guess that's it. I'll leave you alone now and don't worry I REALLY WILL THIS TIME. NO matter what I say there's no convincing you. This is my last ode to you: I "jesus" you. 

-Erika

The march break was definitely needed. There was not a day wasted. I completely took advantage of the break. But tomorrow is back to my reality! Went to Janelle and Bosing's birthday dinner at Montana. Guess what I had! I had a dish that was spicy :|.... yes... I know. Then, dance practice for Kim's debut. Intense I tell you but it was worth it! It was also Ben's birthday which had like three parts to it. Ben and Andrew slept over. We had lunch at Korean Grill House. Guess what I had again?! No, nothing spicy. But I had noodles at Korean BBQ. You know why? Because I couldn't have rice (N). Good times with Holy Cross people though. Spent some gooooood quality time with the Trio and slept over there. Finally took pictures with them two loves. Lastly, also spent some gooooood quality time with Mr. Gay, haha. The name can remain undisclosed. Reason being... I'm being gay. But onto more important things...

The highlight of my break was indifinitely South Scarb's Camp Redemption! I served my chapter by becoming a facilitator to Valerie, Marian and Maria (along with Jessca of course!). I also did a share with Diamond. For that, I must have said a million prayers with Diamond because of anxiety*shrugs*. Anyway, I'm so happy that I was priviledged enough to serve at camp because all the things that I went through went straight to heart. A great new experience for me. And I can't wait for the next time I serve for YFC. We had our ups and downs at camp but overall we succeeded and that's all that matters! God is GOOD.
  



CAMP REDEMPTION! - Paul, Chris, Abby and Tracey

 
Camp Redemption: Service Team+Participants

 
You know how we do.

Jenn's birthday thang: Yes, we had a theme and yes it was Hawaiian :) Jessca is so gay and Dame girrls are nuts! The food was good though it was spicy. I sang until the mic was pried out of my hands (for their sake). Lastly, walking and waiting for the bus was deadly! Thawing at home was great! Korean BBQ w/ Family: Probably the last time were gonna have dinner with my grandma. My dad was using the tongs to eat with. The parents pigged out on the liver, which was fricking disgusting. Me, Yan and Rheya had a good poserific time. ha. Fuck, I'm gonna miss my grandma.

HAPPY 18TH JENNIFER CHOI!

I FRICKING LOVE THIS GIRRL. My sister, dad and grandma are leaving in 13 days *sniff*. I'm so sad. I have to start buying phone cards.

ASSLEY, your debut was live. I had fun. :) Sorry about being late and you looked GORGEOUS! I loved how everyone was matching :). TOO CUTE! Our table had fun with the centrepieces, that's for sure! My elementary folks were there, that was even more of a plus. And Jem, you motherfucker, stop working and come out with us! I broke almost everything that I touched. My rose broke in two (luckily a guy had a another one and randomly gave it to me), my brooch was messed up, and my jewel on my candle ring broke off. But other than that it was great! haha. I had such a great time being Jem's partner! He's jokes and our little stories about us growing up with our big brothers and sisters are definitely unforgettable! The dance portion was fun. YOU KNOW HOW WE DO! ha. And the after party? under age drinking is great. haha. I was responsible that night, like what my mommie asked. I became the caretaker for the night for Grizzy, that drunk. haha. Andrew, you are jokes for life! Do you have a tattoo? no thanks. 48. do you still watch cartoons on Saturday morning? haha i wish. 49. are you hiding something from someone? i guess you can say so. 50. do you play an instrument? used to play the flute.

Jackjack, "oh lolo", and itisssss bebe. haha. Til the next "chillage". See you later best friend ;). 2. I LOVE YOU, JESS. I LOVE YOU, JENN. I LOVE YOU, YAN. I LOVE YOU, INANG. I LOVE YOU, BEN. I LOVE YOU, ANDREW. Homegirl's here if anything. Endless thanks for everything. 3. HB ABEL. ABEL, I love you. You're old. Go buy lottery! super 7! PAYDAY! maan. I'll show you just how much I love you today. *HUMPITY HUMP HUMP* ...pardon my ahem--ness Anyways, we have our whole lives ahead of us and whole lot of opportunities just opened up for you. You lucky damn bastard. 4. FUCK YOU SCHOOOOL. FUCCKK YOUU ESSAYYYYY. FUCCKKK YOUUUU! Next sem = No life. PSHH. I'm ready for you Calculus. *GRRRRR* 5. Lastly, I sit back and smile because of what you do. It makes me giggle at how I dont know you. I threw in the towel and all I can do now is hope to God that a miracle is on its way. Heh. I have realized that no matter how many times I say something that it's not going to change one single bit. So, toodles and I hope and pray that I would never have to encounter anything with you, ever ever again.

ok, here's the thing. i was having a conversation with a good old friend. 
you know the usual catching up, talking about whatever happened in our `situations`
and sad to say that it was just pure laughs and name calling and he said...

"guys are fucked up. girls are fucked up.
and all we need to do is find the right person to be fucked up with."

and at that moment i could not stop myself from laughing. maaannn...

There no words that can explain how much I love these guys. We grew up with each other. We've seen one another in every single phase and every change that we have gone through. It's just amazing how we can be apart for so long and then see each other like we saw each other yesterday. These guys are truly people that I can see at my debut, wedding, my kid's baptism and so on. We went from being sticks to being `meatier` or chubs chubs to slim fit or from bowl cuts to clean cut. ha. I truly love these guys.

CAMP AWAKEEEEEE

I can't explain what happened to me and all the emotions I had all mixed up in one. The talks and shares were heartfelt and relatable. The activities were nothing short of awesome and fun. The lady bondage that went on at night. The bonding and relationship building that went on all weekend! The things that we learned in the talks are indefinitely what we need to go about life. The burning of our burdens is one of the greatest feeling in the world. The songs are used as communication between God and I. My parents are so great. I love them so much. I want to thank them for being here for me.. and for Jess too when her parents couldn't make it. I'm all cried out for all the right reasons. Tears of joy :) Being able to let go, repent, forgive and heal is what I'm learning to do.. is what I need to do. God's path is my path in life. God loves me. (8)one way Jesus You're the only one that I could live for. You are the way the turth and the life we live by faith and not by sight for You were living it all for You(8)

CHEAA!!

our view *sigh* i miss it already. tin modelling our hot hot suite! tin + me, group shot with the hot view :) tin+marian+me, lindSAYY+aid+tin+me (tin again?!?!) our gossip sessions lydia's hot, me+kim tin+sironika the nympho+me (isn't it sooo hot?!?!?!) corners+assley+me, groupshot+me looking retarded the only picture i took during our games, our inukshuk groupshot that's me soaked and muddy roch+marian+corners+assley camp was so much fun! the coach bus, the movies, the singing! we had great activities. we played capture the flag in the rain (ran and slipped = me looking like i pissed my pants), we played this ball game, we played musical chairs as a group with ourselves tied up with 7 other people, we went hiking, and so much! our gossip and talks were hilarious! maaann it was just too fun! our husbands, our issues, relationships, haha........sex. tin with her a.d.d. and her tangled dry hair was a great roomie! ahhh roch, marian, corners, assley, amanda, tin, and aid.. you guys made it soo live. i didn't wanna leave. i wanted to stay longer. aaaahhhhh
btw, i have more if you want them. a lot mooreeee

Thank you Ryan for offcially being the first one to greet me. Thanks to everyone who greeted me a happy birthday :) especially the unexpected ones! it was great Thanks Yan for getting us our cake. Thanks Rheya for helping with loot bags. HA! Thank you for coming to `jessca+errrka dinner` :) You missed out if you didn't go, but it's ok. We ate. Took pictures. We played pin the tail on the donkey. We has a Dora the Explorer pinata. We had a Lizzie McGuire ice cream cake. We had lots of loot bags with goodies :). It was great. BUT i lost my phone. I'm phoneless. It's gone, lost, out in the world without me. *sniff* click for more goodies

So it's Halloween and today was good :). The school day itself was mediocre. So we had our costume stand up assembly and it's great every year. This year Chevonne won with her agent personna from men in black, she's hilarious, cute and fun! I'm glad she won ^.^. And then after that was our last home game against People's Christian Academy. By far the best game everrrrr! We went crazy cheering our school on. It was a close game but of course with amount of spirit that we had :) we won! I got home at around six thirty ish, ate and then went trick or treating with Rheya. and surprise surprise, she went as a princess. Got back at around 8 and ate her chocolate. Our neighbours are so cute! A couple of them made special treats for Rheya... too cute! So overall it was good day :). A change from such a horrible week I had last week (of with the exception of Pooks' birthday). This week better be good. I mean c'mon! It's my birthday on Friday, were having dinner, and with the planning+preparation with jenny and jesscaaa?! I can't wait. Plus I had a talk with my mom about our trip to the Philippines! Guys, I'm leaving December 11th so don't miss me too much (especially you tin!). First days there, my mom and I are going shopping with my aunts, the first friday there were leaving to go to my dad's family in Pangasinan and we come back the tuesday. What else are we doing? well, shopping, shopping and more shopping! :D How exciting eh!? She named a few places that we were visiting too! Makati City, SM mall, and my mom's hometown, Bulacan I can't wait to meet my cousins and relatives there! I can't wait to see what it's like there! I just can't wait! :D.

It's been a while since I've been at a airport (summer of gr. 9). I'm excited but apprehensive at the same.
Lastly, I had a conversation with a smart but cocky person just a minute ago. I never thought that I could agree with someone who phrased what he said to me in such a blunt and somewhat mean way and still be able relate to it. His exact words to me, "he doesn't wanna deal with you. yo im single for life, fuck all the relationships. i can do what i want when i want. u should be like that. stop stressing over 1 guy theres enough boys out there." What a thing to say eh? Was I such a horrible person to him(a retorical question)? Like c'mon QUEEERR! *smiles* just kidding. But nonetheless what he said is true. I think that it's about time to have MORE fun with the boys. (Y)

this has been an issue that tin and i have been talking about in school. we came up with girls are just as fucked up as much as guys are. we noticed that a lot of girls complain about guys comin up short in terms of our expectaions. honestly, it's ridiculous how much we expect of them. some girls complain that the guy is annoying just because he's expressing i guess in an aggressive way that he wants to be with her and at the same time we get frustrated and annoyed when the guy does nothing at all because he respects you or just doesn't wanna rush things with you. really it's ridiculous how we want them to do everything in a relationship. and i frown upon myself because i was one of those girls that complained about every single thing that the guy did wrong. i failed to give the guy a break. furthermore, you have these girls that have pasts with a certain guy and they're still friends but when you talk to them about another guy that you might be interested in all of a sudden they are all uptight and getting into your business. that ever happen to you? well i say to you and all the other girls, why not just leave him out of it... ALL of it? that way he won't try to run your life and you can do whatever you want with the new guy. i mean COME ON. what does telling him about ayour life mean anyways? that you might have feelings for him? its just me two cents. no matter how much history two people of the opposite sex have.. it can never go back to the way things were. it's just not possible. haha girls honestly have such high standards for guys that i actually praise them if they actually get the girl. ha! what the girls problem is that we fail to communicate what we expect of them and please if you say that they should already know im gonna shoot you. quite literally, how are they supposed to know what we are thinking?! they are a completely different species almost. they have a different mind set and act completely different (were from venus and they are from mars remember?) how can they possibly know what we want them to do? the fact is that they can't read minds or even begin to imagine what we expect of them so do yourself and the guy a favor and communicate! easy said than done is what you might say to me but once you overcome this whole communication barrier, it will be a lot easier for you and him in the future. it takes two for everything. it takes two to make a relationship work or crash and burn. its a two way street. as much as we would like to blame the guy for everything we are as bad as they are.

So, today i woke up late for school. I think it was about eight o'clock and so i run downstairs with my towels and robe and kicked my mom out of the bathroom so that i could shower. Showered at a hot ten minutes! Threw some clothes together because we had civies today and quickly tried to apply make up you know the mascara and all that but with no time what so ever i looked like shit. In the midst of all that rushing to get to school, I didn't get to eat my eggs and bacon with hot chocolate that my mom made. On top of that, my dad fell asleep and I hate waking him up cause he gets cranky like me.. and he so after like a good 5 minutes of him ranting on and on we finally left my house at like 8:55 (5 minutes before school started). While i was trying to get my stuff together in the van, i realized that i left my papers at home for my project/presentation today and with totally no time go back i just let it go. So, overall my morning was crap! with all the rushing and chaos and people telling to hurry up and stuff. UGH horrible! It was our daily routine to listen to flow in the morning during our car ride. Then, those favourite songs of mine came on.. and I was wondering why they cut it short and then an announcer came on... revealing the greatest news to my ears. JOHN LEGEND IS HAVING A CONCERT AT MASSEY HALL ON NOVEMBER 27TH. and how do you think i reacted to this news?! OMG i yelled for joy. i was so happy, like i just had the best sex with the hottest man alive on earth over and over again. It completely turned my whole day around. from a crap rushed morning to smiling the whole day because of John Legend. I truly cannot wait. But it's gonna dig a huge hole in my pockets that's supposed to be for the Philippines in December but seriously, I truly cannot pass up John Legend. He is too great of an lycrist, pianist, and singer to pass up. I just can't wait to him live again. ahhhh. =)

and so it's friday night and im already at home when i should be out with mr. friday night having fun. the point is i only have three days left until school and i dont know if i should be jumnping for joy or go on my bed to cry buckets of tears. bah. im looking forward to being a gr 12, graduating, prom, the walk out, throwing paint on mr. dick's and my bestfriend's car! and deep, deep, DEEP  down inside im also looking forward to doing the university applications and that stuff. jessca reminded that tuesday will be our last first day at notre dame. ahh. the school year hasn't even started yet and im already talking about it being done. :S. i guess my point of this whole mabober with school is that. high school has been a blast with my girls in dame. even with our crappy teachers i still love it, which is why im gonna become a high school teacher and replace the crappy ones. all of our memories that we had the past three years, how we've grown together, how we've changed.. its just hard to believe that we only have 10 months left together as dame girls and then only God knows what will happen to us after that. The past three years has been wow amazing, its only fair that we make our last year the craziest, loudest and the most unforgettable year of the all. last year of high school, i welcome you. 

got damn i hate to say it but summer... my love... goodbye. its been fun and i hate to see you leave. its not even worth doing a whole highlight of my summer. everything i've done was great and ahhh. dammnn my freedom is gone and now im limited :|. outings with everyone.. ahh man so great. =) who would have thought that i would still have outings with andrew after he lied to marge and i on multiple occasions, that the elementary thing would actually go through, and that i pulled a marilyn monroe moment HA! and summer school. ohh summer school, i miss you. soo many great times with you hot shits! all i have to say is one word and you'd know if you were live. hahah.... *drum roll* VOLLEYBALL! :D oh thanh, oh thanh. and and OUR not only mine.. haha but our summerschool boyfriends. :D. ha. great timesss. we've branded ourselves crackheads that yelled and laughed at the top of our lungs. summer's been great times a million.

+++ september will be hectic. with a new schedule, my sister's birthday, dealing with school about my soon-to-be piercing, dance for life. coming up for me: a haircut or trim, and my piercing. september is the beginning of the end. what a rollercoaster. 

like i've said before.. everything's over in a blink of an eye.

i've been shopping for a dress! i found a turquoise dress that i love but.. i found another a brown dress i love even more <3 i've been watching a lot of movies and they funny as hell! sorry andrew. i'm still in love with marques houston and his song naked.. pron. neh-ked. ahh neh-ked. i chilled with an oldie, lee-oh-nel, the whole day. it was fun. i went out with andrew and marge again and again and again. i played area 51 like a motherfricking pro bro. i've been having fun with ryan and kami except for them talking so much in sin city. i want holly to be happy, and have a safe trip! i hope to see you soon. i just found out that my pookie is back! nice nice. i come home at late everyday and it's been hella good. i just can't remember it all here's a tip for you; go out and go out like you've never been out before. here's another tip for you; do not make promises that you cannot keep. it's one of my pet peeves. i hate the fact that people can't keep the promises that they make. one thing i learned from past experiences is that i too can't keep promises and is one of the reasons why i rarely make promises to people or can't give a straight answer to some questions. i would hate to disappoint people or getting their hopes up. or my case, getting upset over someone breaking a promise. dont promise anyone anything if you don't intend to keep it. cause once it's broken been that person is left feeling disappointed and feeling like that's person's been lied to. just a tidbit for you.
